What causes Tubular aggregate myopathy ?,"What causes tubular aggregate myopathy? Currently, the underlying cause of tubular aggregate myopathy is not known. Some cases appear to be due to dominant mutations in the STIM1 gene.",GARD,Tubular aggregate myopathy
